name: Wacky Keys
description:
In this action-packed platformer game, players run, leap, and dodge keyboard keys with their own minds! 

Take on the role of the "I" key and funrun your way through tricky puzzles while collecting coins to use at checkpoint restarts.

Collect Hero Coins by diving into the depths of enemies' and successfully evading them.

Players must use their reflexes to sprint and jump at the right times in order to land on safe platforms and beat the levels.

More levels to come!
